eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.model.fd

Class AdvanceBlockBind

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.model.fd.AdvanceBlockBind
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XSerializable

    public class AdvanceBlockBind
extends java.lang.Object
implements XSerializable
    Definition for binding parameters of blocks in the flow-description.xsd.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.06.21.

    • Field Detail

      • id

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String id
        Identifier of this binding. May be used to communicate problematic bindings for the Flow Editor / Compiler.

      • parent

        @NonNull
public AdvanceCompositeBlock parent
        The parent composite block.

      • sourceBlock

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String sourceBlock
        The source block identifier for the binding. If null, the source-parameter refers to the enclosing composite-block's input parameter.

      • sourceParameter

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String sourceParameter
        The source parameter identifier of the source-block or the enclosing composite-block's input parameter.

      • destinationBlock

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String destinationBlock
        The destination block identifier for the binding. If null, the destination-parameter refers to the enclosing composite-block's output parameter.

      • destinationParameter

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String destinationParameter
        The destination parameter identifier of the destination-block or the enclosing composite-block's output parameter.
